issue.subject: Simplify metadata edition toolbars and make them coherent with other views
issue.description:
h2. Goals: * Simplify metadata edition toolbars * Make them coherent with other views toolbars (look, colors, icons and labels) * Since MD form can be a long page, duplicate the toolbar at top and bottom to ease access h2. Enhancements * 'Validate and save', 'save and close', 'save and continue', 'save and publish', 'in progress' (witch saves by the way) will be merged in a 'save' drop down with the standard look * Less used tools : import, replicate, preview (XML & XHTML) and 'reset for'm will be placed under a 'tools' drop down * The 'validate' button (that does not save but only triggers JS validation) is not very useful, we propose to remove it * 'Return' will be named and look like all 'cancel' buttons in easySDI (Joomla's default) * 'Collapse all/expand all' will be removed from the toolbar and be placed in the main 'well' (since it's not an action on MD it should not appear on MD toolbar) * The buttons in the tool bar will of course appear depending of MD status and User rights h2. Proposed look: The toolbar closed: !toolbar_closed.png! The tools : !toolbar_tools.png! The save menu: !toolbar_save.png! Expand/collapse moved: !expand_collapse.png! h2. Positioning

custom_fields.name: Functional impact
custom_fields.value: none (except the removal of the 'validate only' button... that is not really a feature...)

custom_fields.name: Ergonomic impact
custom_fields.value:
- Simplify metadata edition toolbars (no more dynamic number of buttons, the drop down values only changes)
- Make toolbars coherent 
- Ease access tot toolbar

h2. Goals:

* Simplify metadata edition toolbars
* Make them coherent with other views toolbars (look, colors, icons and labels)
* Since MD form can be a long page, duplicate the toolbar at top and bottom to ease access

h2. Enhancements

* 'Validate and save', 'save and close', 'save and continue', 'save and publish', 'in progress' (witch saves by the way) will be merged in a 'save' drop down with the standard look
* Less used tools : import, replicate, preview (XML & XHTML) and 'reset for'm will be placed under a 'tools' drop down
* The 'validate' button (that does not save but only triggers JS validation) is not very useful, we propose to remove it
* 'Return' will be named and look like all 'cancel' buttons in easySDI (Joomla's default)
* 'Collapse all/expand all' will be removed from the toolbar and be placed in the main 'well' (since it's not an action on MD it should not appear on MD toolbar)
* The buttons in the tool bar will of course appear depending of MD status and User rights
